Package dev.project276.entity

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
dev.project276.entity.Entity
dev.project276.entity.MovingEntity
dev.project276.entity.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Knight, Patrol
public class Enemy
extends MovingEntity
The Enemy entity. Enemies chase after the Player. On contact, they deal damage.

    • takeDamage

      public boolean takeDamage​(int damage)
      Represents when the enemy takes damage. Returns false if health <= 0, true otherwise.
      Parameters:
      damage - The damage this enemy receives.
      Returns:
      true if health after taking damage > 0, false otherwise.
